name: Jamaican Jerk Jackfruit Caribbean Black Bean Mango Wraps
description: Jamaican Jerk Jackfruit Caribbean Black Bean Mango Wraps. These Burritos are packed with hot shredded jerk jackfruit, black beans, mango and cucumbers. Serve as wraps or make a sandwich or bowl. Vegan Soy-free Recipe. Can be gluten-free with gf wraps.

video.name: Jamaican Jerk Jackfruit, Carribean Black Bean Wraps | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Jamaican Jerk Jackfruit, Caribbean Black Beans, & Mango Wraps. 
FULL RECIPE HERE: https://www.veganricha.com/2016/05/jamaican-jerk-jackfruit-caribbean-black-bean-mango-wraps.html

Jackfruit is cooked with Easy Homemade Jamaican Jerk seasoning. Caribbean black beans pack a punch with spices, onion, garlic and some orange juice. Together in a wrap, sandwich or bowl with juicy mango. So Delicious! Use any crunchy veggies, greens and sweet fruits and fill up tacos or wraps, or make a bowl. Easy Lunchbox Lunch. 
Vegan Soy-free Recipe. Can be gluten-free.

More Jackfruit Recipes: https://www.veganricha.com/tag/jackfruit

*BUY MY COOKBOOK*: http://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen 


SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

recipeIngredient: 20 oz can young green jack fruit
a good dash of cinnamon, nutmeg and all spice.
1/4 to 1/2 tsp sugar or other sweetener
1 15 oz can black beans or 1.5 cups cooked
1/2 tsp salt (or to taste, depends on the beans)
1.5 tbsp orange juice or 2 tsp lemon juice + 1/4 tsp sugar

itemListElement.text: Drain the jackfruit and wash well. Squeeze out the liquid really well by pressing the jackfruit pieces in a paper napkin. Shred in a food processor or thinly slice using a knife. (For more flavor, toss the shredded jackfruit in the spices, herbs, lime juice and marinate in the fridge for an hour or overnight. then cook with water)
itemListElement.name: Drain the jackfruit and wash well. Squeeze out the liquid really well by pressing the jackfruit pieces in a paper napkin. Shred in a food processor or thinly slice using a knife. (For more flavor, toss the shredded jackfruit in the spices, herbs, lime juice and marinate in the fridge for an hour or overnight. then cook with water)

itemListElement.text: Heat 1 tsp oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add shredded jackfruit and all dry spices (or 1.5 tbsp or more premade jamaican jerk seasoning) . Cook for 2-3 mins or until the spices start to smell roasted.
itemListElement.name: Heat 1 tsp oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add shredded jackfruit and all dry spices (or 1.5 tbsp or more premade jamaican jerk seasoning) . Cook for 2-3 mins or until the spices start to smell roasted.

itemListElement.text: Add lime juice and water and sugar and cook partially covered for 25 to 30 minutes. Stir occasionally.
itemListElement.name: Add lime juice and water and sugar and cook partially covered for 25 to 30 minutes. Stir occasionally.

itemListElement.text: Once the mixture is dry, taste and adjust salt and heat. Add in the 1 tsp oil and continue to roast the jackfruit until golden brown on some edges. Serve this in wraps, sandwiches, tacos, nachos.
itemListElement.name: Once the mixture is dry, taste and adjust salt and heat. Add in the 1 tsp oil and continue to roast the jackfruit until golden brown on some edges. Serve this in wraps, sandwiches, tacos, nachos.

itemListElement.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onions and garlic and cook until translucent. 4-5 mins.
itemListElement.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onions and garlic and cook until translucent. 4-5 mins.

itemListElement.text: Add black beans, spices, water and orange or lime juice and simmer for 10 mins. Stir occasionally.
itemListElement.name: Add black beans, spices, water and orange or lime juice and simmer for 10 mins. Stir occasionally.

itemListElement.text: Layer the black beans, then cilantro or chopped baby green, then a good helping of the jerk jackfruit, then cucumber and mango, lemon, salt and pepper. Fold into a burrito and serve.
itemListElement.name: Layer the black beans, then cilantro or chopped baby green, then a good helping of the jerk jackfruit, then cucumber and mango, lemon, salt and pepper. Fold into a burrito and serve.
